name: MobileJS
body: ### Welcome to MobileJS.io **MobileJS.io is a resource for learning Native Mobile Javascript and the platforms that support it.** ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/joshjensen/mobilejs/master/react-native/readme/TodoMJS-React-Native.png) ## Connect.JS Presenations [](http://www.slideshare.net/joshcjensen/connectjs-2015-building-native-mobile-applications-with-javascript) [Building Native Mobile Applications with Javascript] (http://www.slideshare.net/joshcjensen/connectjs-2015-building-native-mobile-applications-with-javascript) ## Contact Me * Twitter: [@joshj] (http://twitter.com/joshj) * Email: josh@pixelflavor.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
